participants.name: Rachel Turney
participants.description: Adjunct Professor at Fontbonne University - Saint Louis
participants.url: Teacher, Grade 2 at St. Louis Public Schools

messages.message:
Brian
My mom Linda told me that you are my future wife.  Should we be friends on Facebook first?

Lol. Your Mom was too sweet! I can't add you on my facebook currently because I am using it to get grants right now so I have only ppl related to my academic work friended. Once I am done with this grant I am going to change it back to being my personal profile. I told your Mom that if you are ever in the area I will show you around  I am applying for jobs at National Forests and Parks so if I am ever down there I am totally staying with Linda and then we will meet.

Brian
Yeah, she's fun.  She mentioned that you wanted to come visit and check out the Grand Canyon.  Let me know, I make an excellent tour guide.
